=== v0.1.0 (unreleased) ===
 <li>Added backup and restore facility with automatic daily backups.</li>
 <li>Added sync reset facility (like Mozilla's engines).</li>
 <li>Select sync method (merge, replace) on first install.</li>
 <li>Sync stylish settings (same platform only).</li>
